11.content: Ah yes, everyone's favorite eccentric, sweater-clad pre-teen. To allow for multiple writers to have fun with this story, I'm going to set up multiple story ideas (if you think about it, try to do the same when you choose to add). How will she gain?
11.title: Mabel Pines

111.content: How does Mabel gain weight by overeating? Maybe Gruncle Stan lets her eat whatever she wants or maybe she gets addicted to a local brand over food?
111.title: Overeating

choices: Mabel has a few pounds of pudge.
Mabel only has a slight bit of pudge....but....she LIKES IT?
1111.content:
After getting lucky on "Owl Card Scratch" Grand Uncle Stan had gotten more money then he could fit in his old safe, allowing the kids to go on a spending spree.

Dipper had purchased various pieces of gear to help him on his missions.

Soos had begun construction on a statue of Stan.

And Mabel?

UUUUURRRRRRRRRP

Mabel had bought all the candy she could, and then some. While she had always had a sweet tooth, and had kept it filled, it had never been like this before.

For the last three days, Mabel had ate nothing, but massive amounts of sugar, and was bouncing all over the house.

Still, It couldn't be healthy.
1111.title: Cut Loose

114.content:
T'was a fine day in the Sleepy town of gravity falls. The Mystery Shack hung in the morning sun, the missing M still laying upon its roof, Gompers chewing on a nearby can making a normal goat noise. In the front yard, Mabel Pines, the brother of Dipper Pines, stood out playing with her pet Pig, Waddles. During which, a flyer flew onto the ground, causing Waddles to go and chew it. As Mabel took the flyer out of waddles maw, she took a look at the words printed on...

WEIGHTIEST WOMAN CONTEST!
Can you be the next BIG model?
1ST PLACE RECEIVES OUR GRAND PRIZE!
10,000,000 DOLLARS AND A GIANT HAMSTER BALL!

Mabel's eyes glistened as a smile worked up on her face. The project of being able to walk around in a giant Hamster ball was the most amazing thing she had ever heard. With this in mind, Mabel decided to...
114.title: Something else

12.title: Wendy Corduroy

choices: Pounds just pile on working at the Shack
After the events of "Boyz Crazy", she starts comfort eating
Gets a job at Greasy's Diner after the series
121.content: But seriously, this is the last one. Why does our favorite lumberjane start overeating?
121.title: SO! MANY! QUESTIONS!

choices: She decides to see how big she can get
She decides to see if dipper would help her get bigger
1211.content:
“Jeez so many people are here today” thought Wendy
The shack has been so stressful for Wendy lately.
The shack for the past few weeks has been so busy for no apparent reason
The customers has been extremely annoying to Wendy causing her to eat her frustrations away
The candy machine has been stocked often because stan thought the customers have been eating all the snacks
But it was actually Wendy who has been eating all the snacks
Because if that she was starting to get a bit of a belly
Her shirt is also getting tighter and really getting on her nerves
“Hey dipper! Yelled Wendy
“Yeah Wendy?” Asked dipper
“Can you get me some snacks from the vending machine?” Asked Wendy
But haven’t you had like 20 candy bars today alone?” Asked dipper
“Yeah so what?!”asked Wendy with a bit of annoyance in her voice
“Ok ok I’ll get you some” said dipper not trying to upset his crush
“Get me like another 20 please.” Said Wendy
Dipper then gives Wendy 20 chocolate bars and leaves
It’s not like I’m getting fatter or anything” Wendy said in denial
Wendy begins to stuff herself with the chocolate bars
One by one her belly begins to expand inch by inch
After around ten her button up shirt was showing her white undershirt
After the last ten the buttons popped of the bottom of her shirt
Showing her big belly
“God my stomach hurts” thought Wendy
She started to rub her belly to calm it down
She actually started to like her big belly
She thought to herself what it would be like to have a huge gut, big breasts, and a ginormous butt
1211.title: Pounds just pile on working at the Shack

12111.content:
Wendy had made up her mind, she is going to gain a ton of weight, she realized late last night that she liked how big she has gotten
That morning she packed a huge lunch for work
It was basically a full course meal
Had a main course, sides, appetizers, and a huge dessert
Now she was on her way to work, she had packed snacks for the walk to work and back home
So she started to dig in
When she got to the mystery shack she realized that she had eaten all her snacks and her shirt is now really tight, pacifically around the waist.
So she got to work, and today was even worse than the last
Today she was the only one at work so she had to do all the work
After hours of work it was finally her lunch break
So she decided to dig in
Her main dish was 3 large pizzas
She ate furiously
after 3 slices her Waist was starting to be enlarged
She kept eating and eating
With each slice he stomach grew an inch
At the end of the first pizza, her stomach was the size of a very large bowling ball
And now she was getting thirsty so she went to the kitchen to grab a huge bottle of soda and chugged it
Her stomach continued to grow
Her stomach kept growing while chugging, and now her stomach giggled with every step
“Man this stuff is so good” exclaimed Wendy
When she spoke she realized that her cheeks have gotten bigger as well
“Maybe I should go continue eat in the living room” thought Wendy
She continued to eat the rest of the pizza
Her butt had started to get bigger, with each slice her butt stared to get rounder and rounder
Her thighs weren’t spared with this though
Her thighs kept getting thicker to the point where they are right next to each other at all times
12111.title: She decides to see how big she can get

choices: Nah, it would get too weird.
123.content: Should it be the all powerful Bill Cipher?
123.title: Which antagonist?

choices: She wants an escape from reality. A Fattening Dimension should do.
She wants him to make her fat?
1231.content: So, how does Bill get Wendy fat?
1231.title: Deal With the Dorito

choices: Shake his hand and let him stuff Wendy
12313.content:
It was a normal day in gravity falls. Wendy was heading home from a extremely busy day at work.
She walked all the way home, and along the walk she got extremely hungry.
She thought to herself.
“I would give anything to eat and keep eating”
Then she thought to herself and wondered what it would be like to be HUGE!
She liked the idea of it.
She finally got home, and immediately went to her bed and fell asleep.
In her dream, she was in her kitchen, just eating and eating and eating getting bigger and bigger and bigger
Then she woke up
And she saw bill cipher right in front of her
“Hi there lumberjack” said bill
“BILL” screamed wendy
“Don’t worry I’m only here to give you what you truly want” explained bill
“What do you mean?” Asked Wendy
“Your true desire is to gain tons of weight’
You want your gut to expand, you want your butt and breasts to be larger”said bill
“I mean I guess that’s what I want” said Wendy
Well I can help you, if you just shake my hand” bill explained
Wendy thought to herself.
12313.title: She wants him to make her fat

15.title: Other (wait, how many girls are in this show?)

info.brief_description: The force of gravity is about to get a lot stronger for these girls...
info.description:
Pretty straight forward, this is a weight gain story based on the cult Disney cartoon "Gravity Falls". I'm sure you're eager to get started, but first we'll set a few ground rules:

1) Both boys and girls are allowed to gain.
2) Weight gain only. No slob, scat, transformation, AR/AP, inflation, shrinking or any other form of expansion.
3) This story is rated 13+, so no extreme violence, profanity or sexual content.
4) Keep the weight limit realistic (no 100,000 lb. girls or cosmic growth).
5) I shouldn't have to say this, but put some effort into your submission so that it is at least enjoyable.

Alright, let's go!
